KnowledgeItem.Title: LAMPStackWorkflowHandlePKG
KnowledgeItem.Description: Initiates the workflow for handling LAMP Stack install related packages by writing into the MARS model and creating new corresponding data blocks in the Issue

IssueCondition.Description: Searches for an Issue with DataBlock LAMPStackWorkflowHandlePKG and the necessary information for successful completion of workflow.
